title: Dynamic Queue and the Future of League // Response

embed.description: Riot Games loves them some double speak. Also Pwyff is a penguin I guess. body: I actually agree with this wholeheartedly; when Battlefield 1 comes out I'm pretty much dropping this game (after years of playing) unless Riot takes it in another direction. Thoughts?
